channel.title: Help me general problem i guess
channel.description:
well i made a server and i fixed the source and i have a good client that i remade some infos in it but the problem is that when i run the server i cant use my ip shamalscape.no-ip.info is there something wrong with the ip ?
and the error i get is "Error Connecting To Server"
I have Team Viewer if u can help me

item.title: Help me general problem i guess
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

You cant connect on your own server ip… you have to connect on 127.0.0.1

Read full topic
item.source: Help me general problem i guess
